channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KF16JW6AS6TMFTHJRJKKNDQ5
item.description: Looking at the support channel of #ActualBudget on Discord, a lot of issues is about the bank sync. Is this really the selling point of Actual? Do you really have a lot of bank or credit card transactions that you can’t keep up with just manually encoding them? If that’s the case, can’t you just download the csv, transform them accordingly and upload to Actual instead?
item.content:encoded: Looking at the support channel of #ActualBudget on Discord, a lot of issues is about the bank sync. Is this really the selling point of Actual? Do you really have a lot of bank or credit card transactions that you can’t keep up with just manually encoding them? If that’s the case, can’t you just download the csv, transform them accordingly and upload to Actual instead?

item.title: Discussion on Pangolin and Crowdsec Issue
item.description:
Discussion on Pangolin and Crowdsec Issue

This is a reddit discussion about the issue and some helpful links on the workaround for Pangolin to play nicely with Crowdsec.
item.content:encoded:
Discussion on Pangolin and Crowdsec Issue

This is a reddit discussion about the issue and some helpful links on the workaround for Pangolin to play nicely with Crowdsec.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KEP2EX52N50C5AWN54SFH7R6
item.description:
St. John Paul II Chapel mass schedules, Saturday and Sunday. At Ayala Malls Circuit, Makati City:

  • Saturday (Anticipated) 6 PM (English)
  • Sunday 11 AM (English)
  • Sunday 4:30 PM (Tagalog)
  • Sunday 6PM (Tagalog)
item.content:encoded:
St. John Paul II Chapel mass schedules, Saturday and Sunday. At Ayala Malls Circuit, Makati City:

  • Saturday (Anticipated) 6 PM (English)
  • Sunday 11 AM (English)
  • Sunday 4:30 PM (Tagalog)
  • Sunday 6PM (Tagalog)

item.title: N8n auto scaling
item.description:
N8n auto scaling

n8n queue mode build with automatic worker scaling and puppeteer
We might need to explore this should our use case for n8n becomes significantly bigger in the future.
item.content:encoded:
N8n auto scaling

n8n queue mode build with automatic worker scaling and puppeteer
We might need to explore this should our use case for n8n becomes significantly bigger in the future.

item.title: Pingora Proxy Manager
item.description:
Pingora Proxy Manager

A high-performance, zero-downtime reverse proxy manager built on Cloudflare’s Pingora. Simple, Modern, and Fast. Now supports Wildcard SSL & TCP/UDP Streams!
Pretty much like a clone of Nginx Proxy Manager, but looks better.
item.content:encoded:
Pingora Proxy Manager

A high-performance, zero-downtime reverse proxy manager built on Cloudflare’s Pingora. Simple, Modern, and Fast. Now supports Wildcard SSL & TCP/UDP Streams!
Pretty much like a clone of Nginx Proxy Manager, but looks better.
